Package com.oracle.coherence.grpc.client

Class RemoteSessions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.coherence.grpc.client.RemoteSessions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SessionProvider
    @ApplicationScoped
public class RemoteSessions
extends Object
implements SessionProvider
    A CDI producer for GrpcRemoteSession instances.

    20.06
    Author:
    Jonathan Knight 2019.11.28

      • shutdown

        @PreDestroy
public void shutdown()
        Close all GrpcRemoteSession instances created by the RemoteSessions factory.

      • scope

        public static Session.Option scope​(String scope)
        Obtain a Session.Option to specify the scope scope of the required GrpcRemoteSession.

        A scope name of null will use the default scope name Scope.DEFAULT.

        Parameters:
        scope - the scope name of the GrpcRemoteSession
        Returns:
        a Session.Option to specify the scope of the GrpcRemoteSession

      • getSession

        @Produces
@Remote
@Scope
protected GrpcRemoteSession getSession​(javax.enterprise.inject.spi.InjectionPoint injectionPoint)
        Produces a remote GrpcRemoteSession.

        If the value of the scope qualifier is blank or empty String the default Session will be returned.

        Parameters:
        injectionPoint - the InjectionPoint that the cache factory it to be injected into
        Returns:
        the named GrpcRemoteSession
